title: Mwanza Airport major expansion begins
desc: DODOMA: THE government has confirmed that a comprehensive assessment highlights the need to upgrade Mwanza Airport to international standards, with major expansion and redesign works now underway. title: Finding joy in simpler celebrations
desc: PETALING JAYA: As rising costs reshape festive habits, some celebrants are placing greater emphasis on quality food and family time rather than lavish decorations.

title: Former MLB star Yasiel Puig found guilty of obstruction of justice, false statements
desc: A jury found the former Dodgers star guilty of lying to federal investigators about his knowledge of an illegal gambling operation.

title: Company fined $300k after explosion leaves forklift driver with burns
desc: Several 9kg gas bottles at the Auckland Tank Test facility exploded in March 2024, subsequently fuelling a "significant fire".

title: Novel Technique to Detect Cloud Threat Actor Operations
desc: We introduce a novel method that maps cloud alert trends to MITRE ATT&CK techniques. The patterns created could identify threat actors by behavior.

title: Comparative Study Reveals Psychiatric Comorbidities Common in MOGAD, MS, and NMOSD, With Distinct Timing Patterns
desc: A new comparison study of patients with autoimmune diseases reported high rates of anxiety and depression, with notable differences in when psychiatric symptoms emerged relative to disease onset.

title: Trump signs executive order lifting 25% tariff penalty on India
desc: India Business News: US President Donald Trump on Friday signed an executive order revoking the additional 25 per cent tariff imposed on all imports from India over New De.

title: old Jackson Mackay deadlifts into the record books
desc: In January, the Sunshine Coast boy claimed a world record with an 80-kilogram deadlift, beating the previous record of 72 kilograms.

title: Heavy Atoms Defy Expectations As Relativity And Electron Interactions Combine Unexpectedly
desc: Researchers have demonstrated that calculating the energy required to remove an electron from heavy atoms, such as gold and radon, requires accounting for the complex interplay between relativity and electron correlation, as these effects are not simply additive and depend on the order in which they are considered.
